response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, it's worth noting that the product has been assessed to be worth $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price tailored to reflect its true worth to you. My proposed price for the product is $14,000. This offer not only ensures you receive a high-quality product at a competitive rate but also secures your investment in a valuable asset. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 14000}
